channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Medicare open-enrollment season will more complicated this year. Here’s how to make smart choices.
item.description: Read plan details carefully, and expect changes to prices and coverage.

item.title: StandardAero stock gains nearly 30% after pricing IPO above its estimated range
item.description: StandardAero generated a 29% gain in its stock-market debut on Wednesday in a strong showing from the private-equity-backed jet-engine repair and main...

item.title: Harris or Trump may face a House or Senate run by the other party. Here’s what that means for investors.

item.title: Gold Futures Slip in Volatile Trading But Hold Near Record High
item.description: Gold prices fell as the precious metal has recorded some profit-taking, but has continued to hold ground near all-time highs.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Turn Higher; Oil Prices Rise Further
item.description: The S&P 500, Nasdaq Composite and Dow industrials all enjoyed modest gains, reversing earlier losses.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Find insight on Humana, Unicredit and more in the latest Market Talks covering the Financial Services sector.

item.title: Saudi Minister Warns of $50 Oil as OPEC+ Members Flout Production Curbs
item.description: The kingdom called out members for overproducing, in what was seen as a veiled threat of a price war.
